text: Kog sam đavola tražio u tebi (trans. What the Hell I Saw in You) is the first studio album by Serbian and former Yugoslav hard rock band Griva, released in 1983. The album features Griva's debut single, a heavy metal cover of Lepa Brena's song "Sitnije, Cile, sitnije", Griva version entitled "Sitnije, sestro, sitnije". The track "Ti si lija, ti si zmija" features Galija member Nenad Milosavljević on harmonica. ==Track listing== All the lyrics were written by Zlatko Karavla (lyrics) and Josip Sabo (music), except where noted. #"Sitnije, sestro, sitnije" (K. Kovač, M.
